Patent Information.Patent Title: Anti-microbial Peptides And Methods Of Use Thereof
Patent Information.Abstract: Anti-microbial peptides and methods of use are provided.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.9467865] Gram positive bacteria:Listeria monocytogenes EGD (MIC=2 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus 930918-3 (MIC=6 µg/ml), Enterococcus faecalis 94.132 (MIC=2 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas aeruginosa MR 3007 (MIC=4 µg/ml), Escherichia coli ML-35p (MIC=2.7 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium 14028S (MIC=5 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Bactericidal against several Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.

Literature.Title: Styelins, broad-spectrum antimicrobial peptides from the solitary tunicate, Styela clava.
Literature.Author: Lee IH, Cho Y, Lehrer RI.
